segments.text: In this indoor kitchen, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes, her attention solely on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, and the basin is overflowing rapidly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over the front, ruining the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, and her shoe is soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, just keeps wiping that dish towel around the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are up to mischief with the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is perched precariously on the tilting stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll fall, cookies flying everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, expectant, like she's part of the secret plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up, but so dangerous on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks perfect, bushes neat and all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a powder keg waiting to explode with accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
